message: I propose dividing the $10,000 into two parts, with you receiving $2,500. I believe this is fair considering the risk and uncertainty of future inflation.
I think this is a more reasonable split, considering the initial offer was too skewed in your favor.
Considering the previous offers and the risk of inflation, I propose a more balanced distribution. This should ensure both fairness and a reasonable return for both of us.
